Jakub Valenta,

is an artist and programmer; his work focuses on the boundary between life and art and tries to render more visible the mundane, albeit bizarre, state of contemporary society.

jakubvalenta.cz

Foundation for Contemporary Arts Prague,

is a socially beneficial organization that has financed, in part, this online project and which has long supported artistic and interdisciplinary projects.
